zaraz.msgs.no_tools: No tools are currently configured to load.
zaraz.overview.tools.title: Third-party tools
zaraz.overview.tools.subtitle: Manage third-party tools for your site.
zaraz.overview.triggers.title: Triggers
zaraz.overview.triggers.subtitle: Triggers are signals that can define precisely when to start actions in your third-parties.
zaraz.overview.consent.title: Consent Management
zaraz.overview.consent.subtitle: These settings will affect the consent modal on your website
zaraz.page_header.subtitle: Run third-party scripts from the cloud
zaraz.catalog.subtitle: Choose the tools you would like to use in your website.
zaraz.tool.add_field.label: Field name
zaraz.tool.name: Name
zaraz.add_new_tool_modal.title: Add new tool
zaraz.add_new_tool_modal.description: Are you sure you want to continue with configuring
zaraz.tool.details.settings.title: Tool Settings
zaraz.tool.details.settings.subtitle: These settings affect all actions fired by this tool.
zaraz.tool.details.events.title: Tool actions
zaraz.tool.details.events.name: Action Name
zaraz.tool.details.events.empty: No actions are currently configured for this tool.
zaraz.tool.details.events.subtitle: Define what this third-party tool does and under what conditions.
zaraz.tool.details.events.form.new.title: New action
This name will only be used in the Zaraz interface to help you identify your action. It has no effect on the actual data that Zaraz will send to this tool.
zaraz.trigger.form.new.title: Create Trigger
zaraz.trigger.details.name: Trigger Name
zaraz.trigger.details.edit.title: Edit Trigger
zaraz.trigger.details.edit.subtitle: Editing a trigger propagates changes to all the Actions using this trigger
zaraz.trigger.details.create.title: Create Trigger
zaraz.trigger.details.create.subtitle: Use this trigger for setting at least one action to see it working
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.title: Match Rules
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.subtitle: Trigger rules determine the conditions under which this trigger would fire.
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.sub_subtitle: All rules must match for the trigger to start.
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.loadRule.var: The name of the variable you want to match against
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.loadRule.mat: The comparison operator to use when matching against the variable
The value that should match your selected variable
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.clickListene: The selector to use when matching against the DOM
Wait for Zaraz to complete processing all tools before executing the original click action for up to this number of milliseconds. Leave as 0 to disable waiting
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.formSubmissi: The CSS selector to use when matching against the DOM
Only fire the trigger if the matching form(s) has no validation errors
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.timer.interv: The interval in milliseconds between firing the trigger
The number of times the trigger should fire before stopping
zaraz.trigger.details.rules.type.tooltip: The type of rule to use
zaraz.trigger.delete_modal.title: Delete trigger
zaraz.trigger.delete_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this trigger?
zaraz.trigger.delete.tooltip: Triggers can't be deleted while still in use
zaraz.event.delete_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this action?
zaraz.event.delete_modal.title: Delete action
zaraz.event.details.error.duplicate_name: This Action Name already exists. Choose a new Action Name
zaraz.settings.debugKey.title: Debug Key
zaraz.settings.debugKey.description: Use zaraz.debug(DEBUG_KEY) with this key to enable Debug Mode
zaraz.settings.title: Settings
zaraz.settings.subtitle: These settings will affect all your Zaraz tools.
zaraz.settings.historyChange.title: Single Page Application support
zaraz.settings.historyChange.description: Automatically use the "Pageview" trigger upon SPA navigation
zaraz.settings.autoInjectScript.title: Auto-inject script
zaraz.settings.autoInjectScript.descript: Automatically inject the Zaraz Initialization script into the page
zaraz.settings.dataLayer.title: Data layer compatibility mode
zaraz.settings.ecommerce.title: E-commerce tracking
zaraz.settings.ecommerce.description: Enable the Zaraz E-commerce Tracking API
zaraz.settings.injectIframes.title: Iframe injection
zaraz.settings.injectIframes.description: Also inject the Zaraz Initialization script in iframe elements. Depends on "Auto-inject script" being switched on.
zaraz.settings.invalidPath: Please enter a valid path, e.g. "/my/path"
zaraz.settings.initPath.title: Initialization script
zaraz.settings.initPath.description: Path to the Zaraz initialization script. Leave empty to use default, /cdn-cgi/zaraz/i.js
zaraz.settings.scriptPath.title: Main script
zaraz.settings.scriptPath.description: Path to the Zaraz main script. Leave empty to use default, /cdn-cgi/zaraz/s.js
zaraz.settings.trackPath.title: Track endpoint
zaraz.purpose.form.new.title: Create Purpose
zaraz.purpose.details.create.subtitle: Purposes let you group data processing activities
zaraz.purpose.name.label: Purpose name
zaraz.purpose.description.label: Description
zaraz.settings.trackPath.description: Path to send all tracking requests. Leave empty to use default, /cdn-cgi/zaraz/t
zaraz.settings.hideQueryParams.title: Remove URL query parameters
zaraz.settings.hideQueryParams.descripti: Remove all query parameters from URLs, turning https://example.com/?q=hello to https://example.com/
zaraz.settings.hideIPAddress.title: Trim IP addresses
zaraz.settings.hideIPAddress.description: Trim IP addreses before passing them to server-side loaded tools
zaraz.settings.hideExternalReferer.title: Remove external referers
zaraz.settings.hideExternalReferer.descr: Hide the page referer URL if its hostname is different from the website's
zaraz.settings.hideUserAgent.title: Clean User Agent strings
zaraz.settings.hideUserAgent.description: Clear sensitive information from the User Agent string by removing versions, extensions and additional information
zaraz.consent.enabled.label: Enable Consent Management
zaraz.consent.enabled.description: Present a Consent modal and enforce consent settings
zaraz.purposes.cannot_delete: You can't delete this purpose as it is assigned to one or more tools below
zaraz.consent.settings.administratorIden: Name of the legal entity representing the administrator of your website. It will be displayed within the modal.
zaraz.consent.settings.administratorEmai: The email address to which GDPR-related questions about your website can be sent. It will be displayed in the consent modal.
zaraz.consent.settings.companyStreetAddr: The street address of the company. It will be displayed in the consent modal.
zaraz.consent.modalWillReappear: Note: Adding a purpose will make the consent modal re-appear for users who already made their choices
zaraz.consent.missing_fields: The below form must be completed for Consent Management to be enabled.
zaraz.purposes.explain: Reasons for using third-party tools in your website.
zaraz.assignPurposes.explain: Tools that require consent needs to be assigned to a purpose. Tools that are not assigned will be enabled regardless of the consent status.
zaraz.variables.system.page.title: Page title
zaraz.variables.modal.title: Set property name
zaraz.consent.customCSS.explain: The styles will be appended to the modal so you can make it look in line with your brand
zaraz.variables.title: Variables
zaraz.variables.subtitle: Variables are reusable blocks you can use when configuring your tools and triggers.
zaraz.variable.form.new.title: Create Variable
zaraz.variable.name: Variable name
zaraz.variables.none: Click "Create variable" button to create your first variable
zaraz.variable.delete_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this variable?
zaraz.variable.delete_modal.title: Delete variable
zaraz.variable.details.edit.title: Edit Variable
zaraz.variable.details.edit.subtitle: Editing a variable propagates changes to all the Actions using this variable
zaraz.variables.delete.tooltip: Variables can't be deleted while still in use
